name: vsgxchange
description: Utility library for converting 3rd party images, models and fonts formats to/from VulkanSceneGraph.

assimp.description: Enable support for reading 3D model formats as vsg::Node via Assimp

curl.description: Enable support for reading image and model files from http:// and https://

freetype.description: Enable support for reading fonts as vsg::Font via Freetype

gdal.description: Enable support for reading geospatial data formats as vsg::Data via GDAL

openexr.description: Enable support for reading EXR files as vsg::Data
